title: OLASUL - font ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on the typeface used for the OLASUL logo.

Many thanks in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OLASUL_3724.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [OLASUL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150/http:/typophile.com/files/OLASUL.jpg) | 24.72 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Can't find a match. To me, it looks like a custom job based on [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/gotham/overview) or [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova) with /A "à-la- [Neutraface 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2)"...  
Ready-to-go alternative: [Littera Plain](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/abstrkt/littera-plain)

I designed the logo using Gotham Bold and by modifying only the letter "a" to have sharp point. Hope this helps.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823081150im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Olasul_4902.jpg)
